Ext.toolbar.Toolbar Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.Toolbar
  • Ext.toolbar.Toolbar
  • toolbar
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.toolbar.Toolbar Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.toolbar.Toolbar', {
        renderTo: document.body,
        width: 400,
        items: [{
            text: 'Button'
        }, {
            xtype: 'splitbutton',
            text: 'Split Button'
        }, '->',
        {
            xtype: 'textfield',
            name: 'field1',
            emptyText: 'enter search term'
        }]
    });
});
